There comes a time in your life where you're so done with the shit a game and its creators do to you that you just say YES to all ''Was this review helpful?'' negative review, uninstall the thing and never touch it again for the sake of your own sanity.

This game currently quite literally promotes anti-fun. the core mechanics this game was designed around are incredibly flawed, and rather than look at the gameplay and listen to players, or attempt to fix it, the devs will just keep making power-creep, band-aid perks to try and right the wrongs of this game. The meta for killer and survivors are both stale. the perks and characters you will see every game are stale. The entire design philosophy of this game is to have fun by attempting to reduce the fun of the other side. People will say the community is toxic, and it can be a little mean at teams sure, but its likely just frustrated players who see what a good game this can be/has been and just want that back.

i have to turn off my audio to start the game past the opening cinematic, nuff said.

Edit : BTW this is a known issue a work around was posted like 2 years ago.
They've released plenty of cosmetics and new killers/survivors, but can't fix a bug that literally crashes your game a start up with 100% certainty. 

I guess if you get lucky or you don't mind turning your audio off and on every time you wanna boot the game, this could be an alright game.

Unattended by devs, they focus on DLCs which are mostly skins. They do not focus on the quality of life of the players, specifically to help maintain a healthy community and not a harsh nor a cheat based one.
Only recommended if playing with friends; may pass if you get addicted easily by online-only games (all progress is cloud based only by the way) regardless the harshness of the community or the lack of variety without recurring to DLCs (making sense the cheapness of the base game, as it's based on old and obsolete Autodesk and Adobe Flash tech; it future seems doomed to keep this same track that it has been following, the game principle is simple and won't seem to change anytime on its lifetime anyways).

外挂越来越多，人类加速跑的比杀手还快，封2天还能出来玩。无限复活外挂隔2天就遇到，没见封过。各种裂空BUG，新开的版本地图全是人类大优势，颜色渲染还看着贼诡异，费眼睛。

Se gosta da temática do jogo vai curtir a ideia, de certa forma é divertido mas jogar de killer principalmente hoje onde só o que tem é squad de survivor a última coisa que você vai ter é diversão, relato de main killer, não tenho gameplay suficiente de survivor pra opinar no outro lado da moeda, sem contar a falta de atenção a bugs e balanceamento que a empresa finge que não vê. No mais, vale a pena numa promoção, afinal quanto mais players menos estresse terei com squads fechados.

ดี

This game will consume you, and you will not have fun on either side, but you will still seek it out match after match like a fool. Survivor ques at night can take as long as an actual match, you'll get face-camped at 5 gens, and sometimes your teammates will be the real killers. As killer, you'll get a headache from pallets constantly being yeeted onto your head, dead hard and boons will significantly worsen that headache, and then finally the salt in end game chat will kill off your remaining brain cells. As a wise man once said, go play civ 6 instead, unless you're prepared to brave this hellscape and find the pleasure in pain like Pinhead. 

TLDR: Play if you're a masochist. (In all seriousness, it can be a fun game and has a lot of beloved licensed characters in it, but don't play if you don't want to be tilted every other match)

I take a break from this game for a few months, I come back and oh god. It's nothing like it used to be- I wasn't aware they changed it to Sweat by Daylight. This entire mmr system has killed the casual scene, which I think is where this game can really strive. Even if you try to play it optimally- whether that is looping the killer, gen rushing, tunneling survivors, camping etc. the game punishes you either way. This is the worst state I've seen the game in, with loads of "content" being pushed out trying to hide that fact that the base game play itself is still abysmal. 

Rework your system devs ; just because there is no competition doesn't mean you get to slack off. 
Yeah no, I'm out - see you in 4 months if I even remember this train wreck exists.

和其他游戏不同的是，他不提供语音交流渠道，可能对部分人士有点可惜，但却又让游戏的公平达到较高水平，且不会随意的被某些入戏人士语言霸凌，当然还是可以在游戏后发言，所以还是很不错的。
虽然一直修机器感到乏味，但善用技巧与杀手互动，也是游戏的乐趣之一。使用不同的杀手也有不同的体验与乐趣，就看有没有灵机一动啦
